actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Park Service Concessions Management Improvement Act of 1998 regarding certain small contracts.

summary.text: Amends the National Park Service Concessions Management Improvement Act of 1998 to: (1) raise the gross annual receipt ceilings for National Park Service concessions contracts for which the Secretary of the Interior may grant a preferential right of renewal; and (2) prohibit applying a preferential right of renewal to concessioners that hold at least five such contracts or have aggregate gross annual receipts of $25 million or more from such contracts.

titles.title: To amend the National Park Service Concessions Management Improvement Act of 1998 regarding certain small contracts.
